name: Speedles
description:
A game about a speedy beetle. A platformer inspired by speedrunning that my friends  and I made in high school for our art final. We made it in stencyl over the course of about 4 months, and was the first game we all made. 

It's a .swf file from the game that I happened to have backed up to drive. I lost the original projects files in a house fire, so this is all that remains.  I wish I could export it to something more convenient.
